CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** When checked, the Item can be assigned to Contacts indicating benefit or ownership over goods and services. Automatically calculated based on the parent Item Class "Type".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** When checked, the Item can be assigned to Contacts indicating benefit or ownership over goods and services. Automatically calculated based on the parent Item Class "Type".
CustomField.label: SYSTEM (ALWAYS TRUE FOR TICKET TYPE)
